javascript:!function(){var o={};o.copyToClipboard=void 0,o.copyToClipboard=function(o,t,e){var n,i;e&&(n=e.body,(i=e.createElement("button")).setAttribute("style",["position: fixed","top: 0px","left: 0px","z-index: 99999","background: lightgreen","border: 2px solid black","border: color: black","letter-spacing: normal","word-spacing: normal","text-transform: none","text-indent: 0px","text-shadow: none","display: inline-block","text-align: center","cursor: default","box-sizing: border-box","margin: 0em","font: 400 20pt Arial"].join(";")),i.textContent=t,n.appendChild(i),i.onclick=function(){navigator.clipboard.writeText(o).then(function(){console.log("Content copied to clipboard")},function(){console.log("Failed to copy content to clipboard")}),n.removeChild(i)})};var t=document.title.replace(/[\|\[\(\]\)]/g," ").replace(/\s+/g,"").trim(),e=document.location.href,n=new Date,i=n.getTimezoneOffset(),r=(n=new Date(n.getTime()-60*i*1e3)).toISOString().split("T")[0];o.copyToClipboard("- "+r+" ["+t+"]("+e+")","Copy Page URL to Clipboard",document)}();
